arts.ttl: Newport County 0-1 Salford City: Frustrations mount as the Exiles suffer their first home league defeat
arts.sum: Elsewhere, Kai Whitmore, who has played in all of the Exiles’ opening three league games this season, was not involved in the encounter as Ben Lloyd started. Like the first 45 minutes, Smith had a real good chance to score his first goal of the season moments later, but was saved by Young, as the hosts began to pile pressure on ‘The Ammies’.
